Gift Guide: Under $75 
Weve already shown our favorite budget buys and value sets, now its time to get into the show-stoppers. Under $75 will get you some of the most lust-worthy beauty gift sets of the season, without having to blow your budget (you just need to know where to look)! 
Luxe spa-worthy skincare sets, makeup palettes that will excite any beauty lover and beauty tools that they wont be able to live without.  Here are 18 fabulous gifts that will make you their holiday hero!


Bliss Be Spa-velous, $55
Treat them to a spa-quality experience at home with this luxurious pampering kit complete with Bliss famous Hot Salt Scrub, 24-Heaven Body Balm, Foot Patrol and three single-use sachets of their new (and totally incredible) Multi-face-ted Mask.  Available at Sephora.

Obsessive Compulsive Cosmetics Cosmetic Colour Pencil Essentials x6 Set, $54
For the girl that loves to play with color, you cant beat OCC. This kit features six vibrant pencils from the pigment-packed Colour Pencil range, including blue, magenta, red, burgundy, black and white. Available at Sephora.

Make Up For Ever Studio Case, $68
Weve raved over Make Up For Evers incredible new Artist Shadow a lot already, and now you can try 12 gorgeous shades for less than the price of 3 (plus it also comes with their new Artist Liner in black too). A mix of neutrals and colors makes this kit a great gift to give for any beauty aficionado. Available at Sephora.

Fresh Skincare Idols, $68
For those who crave hydration, this luxurious set of best-selling skincare must-haves from Fresh is a surefire winner. Including their famous Soy Face Cleanser, Seaberry Moisturizing Face Oil, Sugar Advanced Therapy Lip Treatment and Black Tea Maskyoull be their skin saviour! Available at Sephora.

Sephora Alexis Bittar Liquid Gold Beauty Brush & Travel Wrap, $73
This Holiday, luxury jewelry designer Alexis Bittar teamed up with Sephora to offer a range of luxe beauty accessories and tools that would make any fashionista happy. This gorgeous powder brush can be used for bronzer, blush, powder or highlighter and it even comes in its own travel-friendly pouch. Available at Sephora.

Atelier Cologne Mini Discovery Collection, $60
Were all obsessed with Atelier Cologne and their unique, captivating scents. We do admit though, its not always choosing just oneso this discovery collection is great for any fragrance lover because it offers 5 mini vials of their famous citrus-infused scents. Available at Sephora.

Urban Decay Vice 3 Palette, $70
Urban Decay lovers, rejoicethe third installment of the bold and wonderful Vice palette has finally landed. 20 rich, pigmented eyeshadows in a variety of neutral and vibrant shades will allow anyones inner makeup artist to come out.  Available at Sephora.

The Body Shop Ultimate Luxuries Collection in Shea, $55
This perfectly packaged gift box features an array of luscious bath & body products scented with the addictive Shea scent (the kit is also available in Strawberry, Moringa and Coconut too)! Available at The Body Shop.

BUXOM Lip Gloss Roulette, $74
This lustworthy set of 15 glosses (lets say that again, 15!!!) features 11 sheer, shimmery shades as well as 4 full-coverage luscious colors with a slightly plumping tingle (no burningpromise)! This formula has been an editor favorite for years and this set is a great way to try a bunch of shades. Available at Sephora.

Kat Von D Star Studded Shadow, $66
Kats limited edition book of 24 bold eyeshadows contains a variety of textures, from mattes to shimmers. Each row represents an expertly-coordinated quad of shades that work beautifully together (or get creative and mix and match your own)! Available at Sephora.

NARS Virtual Domination Cheek Palette, $75
It wouldnt be a holiday season without NARS covetable cheek palettes and this year is better than ever. Featuring three best-selling blushes, one glowing highlight powder and possibly the most famous bronzer everLagunathis palette is absolutely the one to get for the girl that knows her beauty brands. Available at Sephora.

Emjoi Micro Nail, $60
From the creators of the must-have Micro Pedi (another must have holiday gift) comes this unique nail care tool designed to electrically polish, buff and shine nails in just seconds. For any nail lover, this tool is a total godsend and theyll wonder how they ever lived without it! Available at Shoppers Drug Mart.

NUDESTIX #GILTYLOVE Holiday Trio, $55
Weve become obsessed with the simplified beauty brand NUDESTIX, and this holiday collector trio (with a specially-designed tin) contains three amazing cream eyeshadow shades that flatter anyone and everyone! These crease-free shadows are sure to kick off a total obsession with this new, youthful brand. Available at Sephora.

Sephora Favorites Skin Wonderland, $70

Sephora Birthday Haul: Sun Safety Kit! Sephora haul time! Can you believe this is only the second time I've bought from Sephora? There's always plenty I'd love to buy, but with shipping costs, taxes, and good ol' Canadian price markups, I just often can't be bothered. Oh, and the major factor of there being no physical Sephora location in my province. :( I'm a Shoppers Drug Mart gal for the most part (and yes, you'll be seeing a haul from there soon..), with its drawback there being no Too Faced, UD, etc! I could see myself shopping Sephora a lot more often if there was a store nearby, but alas.Anyway, enough first world beauty problems -- on to the haul! I also received the MUFE Birthday Gift, a deluxe sample, and the three regular samples, but I'll save those for another post as this one will be a bit long!Click below for a breakdown of the products included and my thoughts!When I saw the Sephora Favorites Sun Safety Kit(currently out of stock) for 2014 was being launched, I desperately went to the site to see if it would be available for Canadians (it hasn't been before, if I recall correctly). I was really excited to see it was, and it had a $38 price tag, a mere $6 markup from the American price. I knew I had to get it, especially with MAKE UP FOR EVER offering this year's birthday gift that I could add-on. I was a bit afraid the Canadian ordering process was a glitch, as someone asked on the Facebook Sephora page if the kits would be available to Canadians this year, the representative replied with a "no." Not sure what happened there, but the ordering process went smoothly and the package, in all its glory, arrived on my birthday! Evidently, these kits are popular and they sold out within two days of launching.The Summer Safety Kit contains 16 samples and $20 from each sale benefits the Skin Cancer Foundation.Included in the kit, with price breakdown and commentary. All prices in Canadian dollars, unless otherwise noted:Too Faced Chocolate Soleil Medium/Deep Matte BronzerFull size: $38, 0.35 ozSample size: $15.20, 0.14 ozI'm really excited this was included, as I've heard Too Faced's bronzers are great! I probably would have benefited more from the Milk Chocolate Soleil bronzer, which is lighter, but I'll make this one work. And yes, it does smell like chocolate!Peter Thomas Roth Max Sheer All Day Moisture Defense Lotion SPF 30Full size: $42, 1.7 ozSample size: $12.35, 0.5 ozSunscreen! The name "Peter Thomas Roth" always makes me think of David Lee Roth. JUMP!I only wish my hair was half as majestic. (Source.)Dr. Dennis Gross Skincare Alpha Beta Daily Glow MoistureFull size: $50, 30 mlSample size: $3.33, 2mlMeh, a foilie. I'm not really sure why Sephora bothered including this, but oh well -- I'll try it.Dr. Dennis Gross Skincare Alpha Beta Glow PadsFull size: $14-82, 5-50 towelettesSample size: $2.80, 1 towelette (using $14 price)Another one use only sample, but it sounds like it might have some benefit. It's an exfoliating self-tanner pad, which sounds interesting.Clarins UV Plus HP Broad Spectrum SPF 40 Sunscreen Multi-ProtectionFull size: $42.02, 1.7 ozSample size: $7.41, 0.3 ozYay, Clarins! I always hear good things about Clarins skincare so I'll happily try this!tarte Brazilliance Skin Rejuvenating Maracuja Self TannerFull size: $47, 5.5 ozSample size: $4.27, 0.5 ozYay, tarte! I'm afraid of self-tanners, but I might try to use this on my pasty legs.Murad Oil-Control Mattifier SPF 15 PA++Full size: $39.50, 1.7 ozSample size: $7.67, 0.33 ozThe lowest SPF in the kit. I'd save this for winter, but it's supposed to be mattifying, which would make it better for summer... hmm, maybe just in the evenings?Stila Stay All Day 10-In-One HD Bronzing Beauty Balm With Broad Spectrum SPF 30Full size: $50, 1.3 ozSample size: $8.85, 0.23 ozThese names just keep getting longer and longer. This seems like it could be awesome or just look terrible on my pale skin. I'm intrigued, though!bareMinerals READY Touch Up Veil Broad Spectrum SPF 15 in TranslucentFull size: $28, 0.3 ozSample size: $14, 0.15 ozThe Sephora website says some of the shades of the Touch Up Veils are 0.03 oz, which they decidedly are not because that would make this sample bigger than the retail version. It's actually have the size, which is still pretty nice. I love the "Hello." on the plastic insert in the compact! The veil is also super-creamy to the touch -- haven't tried it on the face yet, but I'm thinking I'll like it.Supergoop! Sun-Defying Sunscreen Oil Broad Spectrum SPF 50 PA+++Full size: $10 USD, 1 oz; $26 USD, 5 ozSample size: $10 USD, 1 ozSupergoop! isn't sold on the Canadian website, so score for having it in this kit. I've never tried a sunscreen oil before; looks fun!St. Tropez Self Tan Bronzing MousseFull size: $22.50-$49.50, 1.69 oz-8ozSample size: $22.50, 1.69 ozNice sample value! I'm not sure I'm brave enough to use this... I know this brand is much-loved by the self-tanning crowd, but I'm afraid of messing it up!Origins A

Why Dave loves the Shiseido brand. If you’re a regular Cityline viewer or follower my twitter contests and stories, you’ll know that I’m a big fan of the Shiseido brand. Not as well-known as say Clinique or Estee Lauder in North America or Europe, Shiseido is in fact, the fourth largest cosmetics company in the world. It is renowned for its quality and science throughout Asia boasting dozens of research and development centers and labs. Many top hotel chains in Asia proudly offer Shiseido toiletries in their deluxe rooms as a sign of ultimate quality and respect for their guests.

The reason Shiseido flies under the beauty radar is due to its rich Japanese history. It is considered in bad taste to be boastful or talk about oneself too much in Japan. So Shiseido tends to whisper in its ads and politely smile when you walk past its department store counters. Sadly, many of ... lost in the competitive beauty marketing environment in the Western World. Other brands are much more aggressive in their advertising.
Shiseido began in 1872 as a Western-style pharmacy in the heart of Tokyo. It quickly became known for its cosmetic technology ... but the techniques to get the best results from the formulas.
Here’s a little insider timeline to showcase some of Shiseido’s rich history and cosmetic breakthroughs.

1872: Arinobu Fukuhara establishes Japan’s first Western-style pharmacy in Ginza, Tokyo
1888: Shiseido introduces Fukuhara Sanitary Toothpaste

1897: Enters the cosmetic arena with Eudermine, a softening lotion that delivers immediate moisture and improves ... Introduces Seven Colours Face Powder
1918: Launches a cold cream product.
1923: Begins building a network of chain stores for Shiseido cosmetics.

1927: Changes limited partnership to joint-stock company Shiseido Co., Ltd; Shinzo Fukuhara becomes becomes the first president
1931: Exports Rose Cosmetics to Southeast Asian countries; starts a full-fledged international business
1932: Releases De Luxe
1934: Miss Shiseido promotional campaign begins
1937: Inaugurates the Camellia Club and commemorative gift program (runs through 2003)
1937: Develops new Shiseido-style facial treatment and specialty products
1939: The Shiseido research and development lab is completed in Japan
1949: The company is listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange
1953: Establishes Shiseido Institute of Beauty Sciences
1956: Opens Shiseido Beauty Salon in Shibuya, Tokyo

1961: Conducts first ever makeup campaign “Candy Tone”
1962: Establishes Shiseido of Hawaii, the company’s first overseas investment
1963: Begins selling its products in Italy, its first export to Europe
1965: Shiseido Cosmetics America Ltd is established.

1966: Conducts “Beloved by the Sun” campaign and the first overseas shoot in Hawaii
1968: Opens the Shiseido Research Labs in Yokohama (renamed Shiseido Research Center in 2000)
1975: Launches “Shiseido – The Ginza”
1984: Starts the commercial production of the exclusive ingredient “bio-hyaluronic acid”
1985: Hosts “The Art of Beauty” Exhibition in New York City chronicling 113 years of Shiseido advertising
1989: Collaborates with Harvard University to establish the world’s first dermatological research center
1995: Establishes Shiseido International
1997: Marks the 100th anniversary of Eudermine
2000: Builds a new ultra high-tech research center

2004: Sponsors “Global Beauty ... and Karlie Kloss.

2006: Opens the “Life Quality Beauty Centre” Therapy Makeup Institute

2011: Opens a spectacular new flagship store “Shiseido The Ginza”

2015: Signs a multi-year partnership with the Canadian Synchronized Swimming Team
2015: Launches the first sunscreen that gets

Um dos estudos da Shiseido sobre o assunto, por exemplo, foi realizado por pesquisadores da empresa com base de uma análise da epiderme de aproximadamente 2000 pessoas em torno do mundo. Outro ponto importante que os estudos da Shiseido demonstram é que os danos causados pela SERPINB3 à epiderme também prejudicam.a camada basal e se propagam pela derme, camada ... propionic acid", um derivado de aminoácido inibidor da SERPBINB3 e usado na linha FUTURE SOLUTION LX. 시세이도 뷰티클래스에서 촉촉한 화이트쿠션을 만났습니다 요즈음 뷰티 브랜드에서 한국 여성들을 위해 쿠션이 많이 출시되고 있습니다. 시세이도에서는 대표적으로 화이트쿠션과 블랙쿠션이 출시되어 많은 여성분들의 사랑을 받고 있어요. 피부 타입과 계절에 따라 쿠션을 바꿔주는 게 맞다고 보는데요. 스타일러 by 주부생활의 초청으로 시세이도 뷰티 클래스에 참석했습니다. 시세이도의 뷰티 아이템들을 다양하게 체험하고 유명 메이크업 아티스트에게 꿀팁도 전수 받았어요. 시세이도 뷰티 클래스에서 화이트 쿠션 발라보고 완전 반해서 돌아왔습니다!! 올가을 트렌드 메이크업도 배웠는데요.여러분에게 뷰티팁도 살짝 알려드리겠습니다. 더북 컴퍼니 3층에서 진행된 시세이도 뷰티클래스. 뷰티클래.......

delle ghiandole sebacee, dall’altra intervenire a posteriori con il make-up. Ecco la nostra guida in sette punti in collaborazione con Shiseido:
1. Detergere il viso con ingredienti purificanti ma non aggressivi
Molti prodotti specifici per pelli grasse e miste – che ... come «beauty food», l’estratto di pappa reale oltre a purificare contiene aminoacidi, vitamine e minerali che favoriscono l’idratazione. Per questo Shiseido l’ha usato come ingrediente principale del suo detergente Waso Quick Gentle Cleanser Gel (€ 33): con miele e pappa reale, ... impurità, trucco e sebo in eccesso, senza però privare la pelle della sua idratazione.
Waso Quick Gentle Cleanser Gel di Shiseido
 
2. Usare maschere all’argilla
In particolare l’argilla verde, purificante, da fare un paio di volte a settimana. Antitossica e riequilibrante, ... più o meno ricca e pastosa. Le pelli lucide devono cercare creme idratanti con attivi “mattificanti”, ovvero a effetto opaco. Shiseido ha usato la foglia del nespolo del Giappone, che ha la specifica funzione di prevenire l’ossidazione del sebo nella pelle, ... il sebo. Inoltre, alla formula sono state aggiunte delle polveri appositamente studiate per opacizzare.
Waso Quick Matte Moisturizer Oil-free di Shiseido
 
4. Vaporizzare acqua sul viso
Le cosiddette Face Mist dall’Oriente sono arrivate da noi e, se non lo avete ancora ... da poter essere usato da solo o come base sotto il fondotinta.
Waso Color-Smart Day Moisturizier Oil-free Spf 30 di Shiseido
 
6. Prendere confidenza con la cipria
Senza usarne troppa e creare la tanto scongiurata Cakey Face, la cipria va usata in piccole dosi ma, se serve, più volte durante la giornata. Translucent Pressed Powder di Shiseido, compatta dalla consistenza ultra-sottile, elimina la lucidità e migliora la tenuta del make-up, rendendo il look più omogeneo e raffinato.
Translucent Pressed Powder di Shiseido
 
7. Tenere in borsa le salviette assorbi-sebo
Per i momenti SOS bisognerebbe tenere in borsa, accanto ai fazzolettini da naso, ... tamponano sulle zone lucide e in pochi attimi opacizzano la pelle e tolgono l’unto. Sotto, Pureness Oil-Control Blotting Paper di Shiseido, cartine assorbenti arricchite di un ingrediente che assorbe il sebo in eccesso per un’immediata sensazione di freschezza.
Pureness Oil-Control Blotting Paper di Shiseido
L'articolo 7 rimedi contro la pelle lucida sembra essere il primo su Glamour.it.

Shiseido Future Solution LX: il segreto della longevità 
Shiseido Future Solution LX: un lussuoso trattamento anti-età per prendersi cura di noi stesse.  
L’epoca in cui viviamo è caratterizzata dalla ... questa esperienza meravigliosa dei 5 sensi, voglio almeno provare a descriverla, raccontandovi al meglio le caratteristiche di questo trattamento anti-età Shiseido Future Solution LX. 
Voglio fare una premessa: il marchio Shiseido è già di per sé una garanzia. Ogni prodotto è migliore del precedente e ciò testimonia la ricerca costante di nuovi approcci per la cura della pelle. 
Nella formula della nuova Future Solution LX, Shiseido ha introdotto un potente fattore che caratterizza la ricchezza della vita giapponese: le forze vitali della Natura. 
Fin dall’antichità i ... L’intera linea infatti è arricchita da un’avanzata tecnologia anti – invecchiamento ispirata alla ricerca sulla longevità delle piante. Nello specifico Shiseido ha rivolto l’attenzione ai poteri incredibili di ENMEI HERB, un’erba molto conosciuta in Giappone per i suoi effetti positivi e ... le forze vitali di un raro albero di 350 anni destinato all’estinzione, facendolo rifiorire! 
Ho catturato la vostra attenzione? 
Ecco Shiseido ha acquisito una Enmei Herb ai piedi di un monte giapponese di cui non ricordo il nome, per assicurarsi fornitura ... sera ( niente a che vedere con un normale tonico ). Grazie ai suoi due principi attivi esclusivi del marchio Shiseido, agisce su ispessimento e ruvidità. Dopo circa 20 giorni di utilizzo i pori sono meno visibili e la grana affinata. ... tatto e della vista con la ricchezza giapponese, ancora prima che l’esperienza di cura della pelle abbia inizio, i designer Shiseido si sono ispirati appunto al concetto giapponese di ITSUKUSHIMI ( prendersi cura di qualcosa)  e ORIGATA ( arte del dono ... debba partire appunto da una motivazione diversa rispetto a quella di comprarsi semplicemente una buona crema antirughe. Future Solution LX Shiseido è un’esperienza, un percorso sensoriale. Significa farsi un dono, un dono davvero speciale e personale: è regalarsi un nuovo modo

Shiseido Instroke Eyeliner
Le più recenti novità make up sul mercato consentono di ottenere un tratto perfetto in ogni circostanza. Shiseido, in particolare, ha sviluppato il nuovo Instroke Eyeliner, ispirato all’arte calligrafica giapponese, alla sua eleganza e al fascino della precisione che la contraddistingue. Il nuovo eyeliner di Shiseido ha una speciale formula a base di gel e offre un’applicazione precisissima, una texture morbida e tonalità intense. Si stende ... con fibre sintetiche, a punta fine, per un’applicazione precisa.
Per rendere ancora più semplice, delicata e piacevole l’applicazione quotidiana dell’eyeliner, Shiseido propone anche uno speciale pennello creato a mano dagli artigiani giapponesi di Kumano, luogo in cui sono prodotti i pennelli ... stabilità e controllo della punta. L’ideale se si vuole liberare l’ispirazione creativa, tracciando linee sempre perfette.

Ciao Ragazze,

Shiseido crea una nuova routine skincare ispirata alle sessioni di workout e specificatamente pensata per la pelle maschile, per regalarle un ... obiettivi da raggiungere giorno dopo giorno. Un miglioramento continuo e costante. Nel tempo, la trasformazione è visibile. La nuova routine Shiseido Men è ispirata alla filosofia Kaizen: ogni giorno, un obiettivo più audace, un allenamento per la pelle che ne aumenta ... resistenza dall’interno.

La nuova Total Revitalizer Cream  allena la pelle a raggiungere la sua condizione ottimale. L’esclusivo metodo di applicazione Shiseido e il workout muscolare amplificano il potere della pelle e ne migliorano la performance. La definizione è visibile. L’obiettivo è ... da invecchiamento e stress e protegge la pelle dalla comparsa di linee sottili, aspetto spento e cedimenti.

La formula di Shiseido Men Total Revitalizer Cream combina un’avanzata tecnologia skincare con un originale programma di workout focalizzato sulle forze che agiscono all’interno ... Mattino e/o sera, dopo il detergente e la rasatura.
